code: import withAuthRedirect from'../../hoc/withAuthRedirect';import{sendMessage,setSearch,getUserForMessages,setUserForMessages,setNewDialog}from'../../redux/messages-reducer';import Messages from'./Messages/Messages.jsx';import{connect}from'react-redux';import{compose}from'redux';var mapStateToProps=function mapStateToProps(state){return{dialogItemsData:state.messages.dialogItemsData,dialogsFromSearch:state.messages.dialogsFromSearch,isFetching:state.messages.isFetching,userForMessage:state.messages.userForMessage};};var MessagerContainer=compose(connect(mapStateToProps,{sendMessage:sendMessage,getUserForMessages:getUserForMessages,setUserForMessages:setUserForMessages,setSearch:setSearch,setNewDialog:setNewDialog}),withAuthRedirect)(Messages);export default MessagerContainer;
